best_book.title: The Magic Mirror of the Mermaid Queen (Changeling, #2)

work.original_title: The Magic Mirror of the Mermaid Queen

best_book.title: Interfictions: An Anthology of Interstitial Writing

work.original_title: Interfictions: An Anthology of Interstitial Writing

series.title: The World of Riverside
series.description:
From the author:
    
    Here is a list of all the works set in or around the Riverside district of a city so well-known that, like Manhattan, nobody ever bothers to call it anything but "the city." It's in order, not of publication, but of events as they befall chronologically in that world, with Swordspoint as the Year 0.
    
    http://www.sff.net/people/kushnersherman/kushner/world.html
